name: Maglite Mini-Mag Nylon Holster
description: A nylon, full-flap holster to house your Mag-Lite Mini-Maglite® flashlight. It attaches to belts up to 2.25 inches wide, and uses Velcro® interlocking front and back flaps for quick attachment and sure retention.Made of rugged, woven nylon.Weather-resistant to protect your flashlight.
